Home » 13S4 Saḷāyatanavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 1 Saḷāyatanasaṃyutta » 1.4 Catutthapaṇṇāsaka » 1.4.2 Saṭṭhipeyyālavagga
1.4.2.55 Ajjhattāyatanaaniccasutta
Saḷāyatanasaṃyutta
Catutthapaṇṇāsaka
Saṭṭhipeyyālavagga
Ajjhattāyatanaaniccasutta
222.
914“Cakkhu, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ…pe…  jivhā aniccā…pe…  mano anicco. Evaṃ passaṃ…pe…  nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti.
<< 1.4.2.52--54 Bāhirātītādiyadanattasuttaup1.4.2.56 Ajjhattāyatanadukkhasutta >>
